## compile() function

Compiles the specified string as javascript

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function compile(script: string): CompiledScript;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  script | string | The javascript code to compile |

<b>Returns:</b>

[CompiledScript](./scripthost.compiledscript.md)
